numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This graph shows the percentage of young women and young men who reach out to their parents throughout the week.
2. I noticed that significantly more young women than young men send texts to their parents.
3. I noticed that significantly more young women than young men call their parents.
4. I noticed that significantly more young women than young men visit their parents in person.
5. I noticed that texting is the most popular form of communication among both genders.
6. I wonder how far these people live from their parents.
7. The percentage of visiting parents in person is low.
8. This relates to me and my community.
9. My brother lives in South Carolina.
10. The wife of my brother lives in South Carolina.
11. My sister lives in Rhode Island.
12. The rest of my family lives in New Jersey.
13. We use FaceTime at least 3 times a week.
14. We use FaceTime to stay in touch with them.
15. The headline is: Don't be a stranger!
